name: Jeska's Bunny
description:
I made this game for Bitsyjam! #bitsyjam

A short story about my girlfriend and her girl bunny.

I hope you like it, its my first bitsy game :)

*   If the game doesn't start   *

  • Click the folder icon at the sidebar. 
  • Than click the Jeska's Bunny folder, than the Jeska's Bunny shortcut.
